events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position. The resume highlights strong skills in Java and cloud technologies.
The application has been categorized under Engineering based on keywords such as software engineer, Java, and cloud.
A dedicated recruiter was assigned to the candidate to guide them through the hiring process for the engineering team.
Completed the initial screening call to evaluate the candidateâ€™s experience in software development and cultural fit for our engineering team.
Candidate responded enthusiastically to the initial screening feedback and expressed strong interest in proceeding to the technical interview stage.
The technical interview for the Software Engineer position has been scheduled for next week with the senior developer team.
